mapper.insert: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `fb_directory` ( `directory_id` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, `path` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `description` VARCHAR(1024) NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`directory_id`) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `fb_video` ( `video_id` INT NOT NULL, `directory_id` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, `video_path` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `width` INT NOT NULL, `height` INT NOT NULL, `fps` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, `codec` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, `avg_bitrate` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, `running_time` INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`video_id`) )
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `fb_casting` ( `casting_id` INT NOT NULL, `directory_id` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, `actor_name` VARCHAR(45) NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`casting_id`) )
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `fb_genre` ( `genre_id` INT NOT NULL, `directory_id` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, `genre_name` VARCHAR(45) NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`genre_id`) )
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `fb_thumbnail` ( `thumbnail_id` INT NOT NULL, `directory_id` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, `thumbnail_path` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`thumbnail_id`) )
